title: WELCOME TO HOLON CHIROPRACTIC
sitename: HOLON CHIROPRACTIC. English Speaking Chiropractor Barcelona - SPAIN.
cleaned_text: MOVEMENT, ALIGNMENT AND LIBERATION Oliver Dawson, Doctor of Chiropractic. Experienced Certified Applied Kinesiology & CFR Practitioner in Spain. [BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENT NOW](https://holonchiropractic.com/book-first-consultation/) WELCOME TO HOLON CHIROPRACTIC LOCATION: [Carrer Sombreres 27, Principal. Born - BARCELONA](https://g.page/holonchiropractic/review) We specialise in providing care for those with stress and mobility issues. We are dedicated to serving you and your family health through targeting your unique needs. Whether you are suffering from back pain, neck pain, headaches, recovering from an accident or injury; or just looking to improve your overall wellbeing - we can help you achieve your wellness goals. At your first visit at HOLON CHIROPRACTIC we will explain the science behind how chiropractic care works, and give you a full evaluation to see if chiropractic care is right for you. If there is a good fit we can develop a plan of chiropractic care that is specific to your condition and health goals. If you are new to seeing a chiropractor and want to find out more, please email us or call +34 635 055 361 to receive personalised answers to your questions. SCHEDULE: RSVP IMPORTANT: We are implementing the current hygiene standars based on the [STRICT SAFETY MEASURES](https://english.elpais.com/economy_and_business/2020-04-12/wash-clothes-at-60c-and-stay-two-meters-apart-the-spanish-governments-guide-for-returning-workers.html) by the Spanish Goverment as of May 2020.
